SEARCH
Package dev.restate.serde

Interface TypeTag<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:
Serde<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
TypeRef, TypeTag.Class
public interface TypeTag<T>
This interface is used by the serialization stack to carry types runtime information. It is used by the configured SerdeFactory to construct the concrete Serde.

Subclasses include TypeRef, TypeTag.Class and Serde itself.
